page.title: 02Our School on the Abbeydale
page.content: Estate Heron School was opened on the 30th of June 1978 by Mr. Mike Tredgett.At the moment the school has six classrooms, two terrapins and a large hall with a library.It also has a kitchen where all the food is cooked.The school has got a flat roof, and is built of brick.In August 1985 the school will have an extention and it will be twice the size.At the present time there are eight teachers,two male and six female,plus our Headmaster,Mr.Rigden and two secretaries.The school has a large playing field with a football pitch and a hockey pitch.It also has a car park for the teachers cars.The school has two sets of toilets one boys and one girls it also has a stock room,a staff room and usual offices.
